name: Songs.Relationships
desc: The relationships for a song resource.

items.name: albums
items.desc: The albums associated with the song. By default, albums includes identifiers only. Fetch limits: 10 default, 10 maximum

items.name: artists
items.desc: The artists associated with the song. By default, artists includes identifiers only. Fetch limits: 10 default, 10 maximum

items.name: genres
items.desc: The genres associated with the song. By default, genres is not included. Fetch limits: None

items.name: station
items.desc: The station associated with the song. By default, station is not included. Fetch limits: None

items.name: composers
items.desc: The composers for a catalog song.

items.name: library
items.desc: Library song for a catalog song if added to library.

items.name: music-videos
items.desc: Music videos for a catalog song.
